Glendale.First United Methodist Church of Glendal: The First United Methodist Church of Glendale, formerly known as the First Methodist Episcopal Church of Glendale in historical documents, is located at 7102 N. 58th Dr. in downtown Glendale, Arizona, and was built during 1928-29. Its sanctuary, with its linked administration wing, was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2006 for its architecture.
